mutants.code:
def minimize_max_complaints(n, d, b, a):
    d -= 1
    t = 0
    a_prefix_sum = [0] * (n + 1)
    for (i, x) in enumerate(a):
        t += x
        a_prefix_sum[i + 1] = t
    result = max((i - min(a_prefix_sum[min(n, i * d)], a_prefix_sum[n] - a_prefix_sum[max(0, n - i * d)]) // b for i in range(n + 3 >> 1)))
    return result
